effect_entries.effect: Raises the user's Special Defense by two stages.
effect_entries.short_effect: Raises the user's Special Defense by two stages.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
Sharply raises the
user's SPCL.DEF.

Forgets about something
and sharply raises SP. DEF.

Forgets about something
and sharply raises SP. DEF.

Forgets about
something and
sharply raises
SP. DEF.

Sharply raises the
user's SPCL.DEF.

The user temporarily
empties its mind to
forget its concerns.
It sharply raises the
user’s Sp. Def stat.

The user temporarily
empties its mind to
forget its concerns.
It sharply raises the
user’s Sp. Def stat.

The user temporarily
empties its mind to
forget its concerns.
It sharply raises the
user’s Sp. Def stat.

Le lanceur fait le vide dans son esprit
pour oublier ses soucis. Augmente
fortement sa Défense Spéciale.

The user temporarily empties its mind to
forget its concerns.
It sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

The user temporarily empties its mind to
forget its concerns.
It sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

あたまを　からにして
いっしゅん　なにかを　わすれる　ことで
じぶんの　とくぼうを　ぐーんと　あげる。

머리를 비워서 순간적으로
무언가를 잊어버림으로써
자신의 특수방어를 크게 올린다.

Le lanceur fait le vide dans son esprit pour
oublier ses soucis. Augmente fortement sa
Défense Spéciale.

Gedächtnisverlust, der die Spezial-Verteidigung
stark erhöht.

El usuario olvida sus preocupaciones y aumenta
mucho la Defensa Especial.

Chi la usa svuota per un po’ la mente per
dimenticare i problemi. La Difesa Speciale
aumenta di molto.

The user temporarily empties its mind to
forget its concerns.
This sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

頭を　からにして
一瞬　なにかを　忘れることで
自分の　特防を　ぐーんと　あげる。

藉由在一瞬間遺忘某些事
大幅提高自己的特防。

concerns. This sharply raises the user’s Sp. Def stat.

一瞬　なにかを　忘れることで
自分の　特防を　ぐーんと　あげる。

将头脑清空，
瞬间忘记某事，
从而大幅提高自己的特防。
